name: Simon's Canon
description:
A game made for Mini Ludum Dare 72 "elympics"

A WebGL game mixing elements from the electronic game Simon and the genre of Rhythm games. Press the correct arrow key when the input (box) reaches the white line. If you miss an input, you will lose a heart. If you get every input in a set you will regain one heart.

Note

During the jam, and for a while after, there was an online scoreboard system. It seems to be offline now, so the game will only display placeholder scores, and your high scores will not be saved. I was planing to make a backup score system originally with this game, but it did not make the 48 hour cut. If I get very board in the future, or this game experiences some unexpected popularity, I will consider implementing a new highscore server!

Controls
  • Play Note - Arrows
